hotels.title: Copenhagen Sustainable Retreat near Denmark's Largest Shopping Mall
hotels.description: A pioneer in Danish sustainability without sacrificing style or comfort, Crowne Plaza Copenhagen Towers, an IHG Hotel, is minutes from the city centre and the airport. Savour locally-sourced Nordic cuisine in true American diner fashion at BARK restaurant. Then, splurge on some retail therapy at Field's, Denmark's largest shopping mall, less than a five-minute walk from the hotel, or head out to soak up the picturesque architecture and canals of this modern Scandinavian city.
